author: 75008Cristina
title: Overall very good but just a little improve
text: Mercure Montmarte has excelent localization close to Metro stations L2 and L13. The rooms are clean, good breafast in the morning and kind people to welcome us, except for the lady in the front desk for othe checkout which apparently has no patience to deal with people/guests Check out: Mar-8th morning.
